verses.name: Psalms 108:7
verses.text: God hath spoken in his holiness; I will rejoice, I will divide Shechem, and mete out the valley of Succoth.

verses.name: Psalms 108:8
verses.text: Gilead is mine; Manasseh is mine; Ephraim also is the strength of mine head; Judah is my lawgiver;

verses.name: Psalms 108:9
verses.text: Moab is my washpot; over Edom will I cast out my shoe; over Philistia will I triumph.

verses.name: Psalms 108:10
verses.text: Who will bring me into the strong city? who will lead me into Edom?

verses.name: Psalms 108:11
verses.text: Wilt not thou, O God, who hast cast us off? and wilt not thou, O God, go forth with our hosts?
